# Introduction

`RSenaps` is a R package to communicate with [Senaps platform](http://sensor-cloud.io). 

# Before start
A user account needs to be created in [Senaps](http://sensor-cloud.io). It it much securer to use `api key` to make requests to Senaps, not the username and pasword.
